content:
lawley opened issue 260

The class org.hl7.fhir.instance.formats.JsonParser in hapi-fhir-structures-hl7org-dstu2 is not compatible with the "real" reference implementation version since it does not implement the interface org.hl7.fhir.instance.formats.IParser

jamesagnew commented on issue 260

Hi Michael,

We haven't spent any time getting the RI parser to work in HAPI because HAPI's parser already does this job. Is there some functionality in the RI parser that's missing in HAPI?

(I am aware of JSON comments not being round-tripped correctly yet in HAPI's parser.. I think that's the only different I'm aware of though)
